# send(audioBuffer:)

**Instance Method**

Sends an audio frame to all connected receivers.

## Declaration

```swift
func send(audioBuffer: CMSampleBuffer) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **audioBuffer**: The audio buffer to be sent to the receivers.

## Discussion
title: send(audioBuffer:)
